metadata.title: CVE-2018-12181 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Stack overflow in corrupted bmp for EDK II may allow unprivileged user topotentially enable denial of service or elevation of privilege via localaccess.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12181` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 0~20181115.85588389-3ubuntu1
qemu-efi - 0~20181115.85588389-3ubuntu1
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 0~20181115.85588389-3ubuntu1
qemu-efi-arm - 0~20181115.85588389-3ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0~20181115.85588389-3ubuntu1').
